creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure leaning on a desk with his PL fist, watching another male figure, seated on a bench in front of the desk, writing; lightly sketched background
markings: violet stamp on recto, lower right: Samuel Isham Collection/NYPL (Lugt 1402)
provenance: Samuel Isham/NYPL; [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until October 16, 1991; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: The Sergeant Reporter
